response.original_title: Introduction to the Holocaust: Footballers Remember
response.overview: Introduction to the Holocaust: Footballers Remember is a short educational film based on the historic visit in June 2012 by the England football squad to the site of the Nazi concentration and death camp Auschwitz-Birkenau in Poland.  Using both historical footage and contemporary interviews with members of the England squad, Introduction to the Holocaust: Footballers Remember stimulates studentsâ€™ interest in the topic and sets the stage for a more in-depth unit of study.
